name: Junior Sudoku (Easy Fun Puzzles)
description:
Junior Sudoku is meant for little geniuses who love playing with numbers. This app contains challenging Sudoku puzzles that help kids develop logical skills and master the basics of solving puzzles.

- Improve math/logic skill and number recognition
- Easy to solve, minimizing frustration to past stages
- Play 100 unique stages
- Kids friendly theme to keep children interested
- Perfect for Teacher, Parents, Student, Family and Classrooms

Introduce and reinforce number logic to your child in a friendly way. Kids will have a great time finding solutions to these puzzles.
